steps.name:
测试用例名称：审核项目（审核前状态：还款完成）---审核通过-
步骤一：接口关联，数据替换
步骤四：提取出接口关联所需值
步骤五：断言响应结果及数据库

parameters.name: cases
parameters.value: {'id': 7, 'title': '审核项目（审核前状态：还款完成）---审核通过', 'type': 'fail', 'method': 'patch', 'url': '/loan/audit', 'pre_sql': 'update loan set `status`=4 where id=#loan_id#', 'req_data': '{"loan_id":#loan_id#,"approved_or_not":true}', 'extract': None, 'assertion': '[{"expression":"$..code","expected":2,"type":"equal"},{"expression":"$..msg","expected":"项目不在审核中状态","type":"equal"}]', 'assert_db': '[{"sql":"select l.status from loan l where id=#loan_id#","expected":{\'status\': 4},"type_db":"equal"}]'}
